text: Noboru Ishiguro (2 August 1932 - 11 February 2021) was a Japanese racewalker. He competed in the men's 20 kilometres walk at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Ishiguro died on 11 February 2021, at the age of 88.競歩で６４年五輪出場 石黒昇さん死去 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Japanese athletes Category:Olympians for Japan Category:Racewalkers
title: Noboru Ishiguro (athlete)
